title: British Singer Elton John Says He Lost His Eyesight After Eye Infection
content: British singer Elton John told a theatre audience on Sunday that he had lost his sight, months after suffering a severe eye infection.
summary: British singer Elton John told a theatre audience on Sunday that he had lost his sight, months after suffering a severe eye infection.

title: Biden Okays Sale Of $1.17 Billion Worth Helicopter Equipment To India
content: The Biden administration's approval of the sale of major defense equipment to India comes weeks ahead of the completion of its four-year term.
summary: The Biden administration's approval of the sale of major defense equipment to India comes weeks ahead of the completion of its four-year term.

title: Mansion Worth $4 Million Burns Down After Residents Fry Turkey In Garage
content: The Weston Volunteer Fire Department reported that the fire occurred at a home near a large pond in Weston, about 65 miles southwest of Hartford, the state capital.
summary: The Weston Volunteer Fire Department reported that the fire occurred at a home near a large pond in Weston, about 65 miles southwest of Hartford, the state capital.

title: As Intel Forces CEO Pat Gelsinger Out, What's Next For American Chipmaker
content: Less than four years after taking the helm of Intel, Chief Executive Pat Gelsinger resigned from the company on Monday following pressure from the board.
summary: Less than four years after taking the helm of Intel, Chief Executive Pat Gelsinger resigned from the company on Monday following pressure from the board.

title: Apple Accused Of Silencing Workers, Spying On Personal Devices In US Lawsuit
content: Apple has been accused in a new lawsuit of illegally monitoring its workers' personal devices and iCloud accounts while also barring them from discussing their pay and working conditions.
summary: Apple has been accused in a new lawsuit of illegally monitoring its workers' personal devices and iCloud accounts while also barring them from discussing their pay and working conditions.

title: Watch: Fans Worried As Dave Blunts Performs While Hooked To Oxygen Tank
content: Many of Dave Blunts' fans applauded his routine but also expressed concern that he needed to take care of his health.
summary: Many of Dave Blunts' fans applauded his routine but also expressed concern that he needed to take care of his health.

title: Ripple's XRP Surges 40% After Trump Win, But It May Crash Soon
content: On Monday, XRP skyrocketed by an impressive 40% within 24 hours, reaching $ 2.80- a milestone it hadn't achieved in seven years.
summary: On Monday, XRP skyrocketed by an impressive 40% within 24 hours, reaching $ 2.80- a milestone it hadn't achieved in seven years.

title: White House Defends Biden's Hunter Pardon Amid Criticism
content: The White House said on Monday that President JoeBidenpardoned his son Hunter in part because of concern his political opponents would continue to persecute the youngerBidenin the future.
summary: The White House said on Monday that President JoeBidenpardoned his son Hunter in part because of concern his political opponents would continue to persecute the youngerBidenin the future.

title: "All Going To Die": Nargis Fakhri's Sister Arrested For Boyfriend's Murder
content: 'Rockstar'-fame actor Nargis Fakhri's sister Aliya Fakhri has been arrested in the murder probe of her ex-boyfriend and his friend in Queens, New York.
summary: 'Rockstar'-fame actor Nargis Fakhri's sister Aliya Fakhri has been arrested in the murder probe of her ex-boyfriend and his friend in Queens, New York.

title: Trump Names Billionaire Investment Banker Warren Stephens As UK Envoy
content: US President-elect Donald Trump on Monday named billionaire investment banker Warren Stephens as his pick for US ambassador to Britain.
summary: US President-elect Donald Trump on Monday named billionaire investment banker Warren Stephens as his pick for US ambassador to Britain.

title: Donald Trump To Attend Re-Opening Of Notre Dame Cathedral In Paris
content: US President-elect Donald Trump will attend the weekend reopening of the restored Notre Dame cathedral in Paris, which was ravaged by a 2019 fire, he said Monday.
summary: US President-elect Donald Trump will attend the weekend reopening of the restored Notre Dame cathedral in Paris, which was ravaged by a 2019 fire, he said Monday.

title: JD Vance's Picture With Wife's Indian Family Goes Viral. Social Media Reacts
content: As the post went viral, reactions poured in from all quarters with the majority appreciating the Ohio senator for his sweet and loving family.
summary: As the post went viral, reactions poured in from all quarters with the majority appreciating the Ohio senator for his sweet and loving family.

title: US Announces New $725 Million Aid Package For Ukraine
content: The United States on Monday announced a new $725 million military aid package for Ukraine that features a second tranche of landmines as well as anti-air and anti-armor weapons.
summary: The United States on Monday announced a new $725 million military aid package for Ukraine that features a second tranche of landmines as well as anti-air and anti-armor weapons.

title: Elon Musk's $55.8 Billion Tesla Pay Deal Again Rejected By Judge, He Reacts
content: In a statement on Elon Musk's X social media platform, Tesla said it would appeal the verdict.
summary: In a statement on Elon Musk's X social media platform, Tesla said it would appeal the verdict.

title: Harvey Weinstein Hospitalised After 'Alarming' Blood Test, Says His Lawyer
content: Harvey Weinstein was taken to hospital on Monday for treatment after an "alarming" blood test result that required immediate medical attention, and he is expected to stay there until his condition stabilizes, his lawyer said.
summary: Harvey Weinstein was taken to hospital on Monday for treatment after an "alarming" blood test result that required immediate medical attention, and he is expected to stay there until his condition stabilizes, his lawyer said.

title: Who Is Syrian Rebel Group Hayat Tahrir al-Sham That Is Now Holding Aleppo?
content: The Syrian rebel group Hayat Tahrir al-Sham (HTS), which seized Aleppo in a shock offensive over the weekend, is an Islamist movement that has long ruled swathes of the country's northwest.
summary: The Syrian rebel group Hayat Tahrir al-Sham (HTS), which seized Aleppo in a shock offensive over the weekend, is an Islamist movement that has long ruled swathes of the country's northwest.

title: Israel Launches Retaliatory Strikes Against Hezbollah Across Lebanon
content: The Israeli military said Monday it had "struck Hezbollah terrorists, dozens of launchers, and terrorist infrastructure throughout Lebanon", where a fragile US-brokered truce with the militant group began last week.
summary: The Israeli military said Monday it had "struck Hezbollah terrorists, dozens of launchers, and terrorist infrastructure throughout Lebanon", where a fragile US-brokered truce with the militant group began last week.

title: Israel Army Tells Gaza Civilians In South To Move To 'Humanitarian Zone'
content: The Israeli army called for the evacuation of some areas in southern Gaza on Monday, warning that Palestinian militants were launching rockets from there.
summary: The Israeli army called for the evacuation of some areas in southern Gaza on Monday, warning that Palestinian militants were launching rockets from there.

title: "If Gaza Hostages Are Not Released...": Donald Trump's Big Warning To Hamas
content: U.S. President-elect Donald Trump said there would be "hell to pay" in the Middle East if hostages held in the Gaza Strip were not released prior to his Jan. 20 inauguration.
summary: U.S. President-elect Donald Trump said there would be "hell to pay" in the Middle East if hostages held in the Gaza Strip were not released prior to his Jan. 20 inauguration.

title: Arrest Warrants Issued For Imran Khan, His Wife Over Islamabad Protest
content: An anti-terrorism court in Pakistan issued non-bailable arrest warrants for Imran Khan, his wife Bushra Bibi, Khyber Pakhtunkhwa Chief Minister Ali Amin Gandapur and 93 others in a case related to last week's protests in Islamabad.
summary: An anti-terrorism court in Pakistan issued non-bailable arrest warrants for Imran Khan, his wife Bushra Bibi, Khyber Pakhtunkhwa Chief Minister Ali Amin Gandapur and 93 others in a case related to last week's protests in Islamabad.
